Html:
I'm following the documentation http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg405479(v=PandP.40).aspx, on Chapter 4 about Modular Application Development, it says in Registering Modules in Code:

protected override void ConfigureModuleCatalog()
{
    Type moduleCType = typeof(ModuleC);
    ModuleCatalog.AddModule(
      new ModuleInfo()
      {
          ModuleName = moduleCType.Name,
          ModuleType = moduleCType.AssemblyQualifiedName,
      });
}

I guess that moduleCType.Name is the name of ModuleC Implementation class, the one that inherits from IModule, but how can I get the AssemblyQualifiedName?
Thanks to Agustin Adami, by answering other question I got this answered also.
